section.title: Examples of Performance Clinical Statements
section.para: For the examples in the following chapters, the focus has been to illustrate the ANF Model, using easy and intuitive examples, rather than focus on the correctness of the modeling. The modeling within the post-coordinated expressions of the “topic” could potentially be done in different ways.

entry.para: Narrative: Systolic blood pressure 120 mmHg; taken on right brachial artery using adult blood pressure cuff; patient in sitting position for at least 5 minutes; urinated not more than 30 minutes prior to measurement

para.emphasis: (Has focus) [On examination - Systolic blood pressure reading]-

entry.para: Stamp coordinate: [Solor Module] , [Release Path] , 2007-04-05T14:30Z Statement id: [UUID]
